column2: cutpoint_a_deaged <- ggplot(dados_hemi_v1, aes(x = K_age_decay, color = Diagnostic, fill = Diagnostic, alpha = 0.4))+
cutpoint_b_deaged <- ggplot(dados_hemi_v1, aes(x = logAvgThickness_age_decay, color = Diagnostic, fill = Diagnostic, alpha = 0.4))+
fig_cutpoint_deaged <- ggarrange(cutpoint_a_deaged, cutpoint_b_deaged, labels = c("A", "B"),  ncol = 1, nrow = 2, font.label = list(size = 11), common.legend = TRUE, legend = "top")
